items.required-text: A title must be held, but does not need to be carried onboard
items.not-required-text: A title is not required for this vessel

items.required-text: Required
items.not-required-text: Not Required

items.required-text: One type I, II, III, or V wearable device for each person on board is always required.
items.not-required-text: One type I, II, III, or V wearable device for each person on board is not required.

items.required-text: One type IV throwable device as an extra is required
items.not-required-text: One type IV throwable device as an extra is not required

items.required-text: One type B-1 fire extinguisher is required
items.not-required-text: One type B-1 fire extinguisher is not required

items.required-text: Two type B-1 or one type B-2 fire extinguisher is required
items.not-required-text: Two type B-1 or one type B-2 fire extinguisher is not required

items.required-text: Three type B-1 or one B-2 plus one B-1 fire extinguisher is required
items.not-required-text: Three type B-1 or one B-2 plus one B-1 fire extinguisher is not required

items.required-text: On Lake Erie, a USCG-approved signal for both day and night use is required
items.not-required-text: On Lake Erie, a USCG-approved signal for both day and night use is not required

items.required-text: On Lake Erie (sunset to sunrise), a USCG approved signal for night use is required
items.not-required-text: On Lake Erie (sunset to sunrise), a USCG approved signal for night use is not required

items.required-text: On waters other than Lake Erie, a distress flag or USCG approved signal for day use is required
items.not-required-text: On waters other than Lake Erie, a distress flag or USCG approved signal for day use is not required

items.required-text: On federal waters, a horn or other device is required
items.not-required-text: On federal waters, a horn or other device is not required

items.required-text: On inland waters a whistel, horn, or other device is required
items.not-required-text: On inland waters a whistel, horn, or other device is not required

items.required-text: One anchor and line of sufficient length is required
items.not-required-text: One anchor and line of sufficient length is not required

items.required-text: Running lights as prescribed by federal and state law are required
items.not-required-text: Running lights as prescribed by federal and state law are not required

items.required-text: Running lights or electric torch or lighted lantern are required
items.not-required-text: Running lights or electric torch or lighted lantern are not required

items.required-text: Anchor light (displayed at anchor) is required
items.not-required-text: Anchor light (displayed at anchor) is not required

items.required-text: Entine and fuel tank compartment ventilation is required
items.not-required-text: Entine and fuel tank compartment ventilation is not required

items.required-text: A backfire flame arrestor for inboard engines is required
items.not-required-text: A backfire flame arrestor for inboard engines is not required

items.required-text: A muffling device or underwater exhaust is required
items.not-required-text: A muffling device or underwater exhaust is not required

items.required-text: An engine cutoff switch lanyard is required
items.not-required-text: An engine cutoff switch lanyard is not required

items.required-text: Inland navigation rules are required
items.not-required-text: Inland navigation rules are not required

items.required-text: A garbage placard is required
items.not-required-text: A garbage placard is not required

items.required-text: An oil pollution placard is required
items.not-required-text: An oil pollution placard is not required
